comments.en:
PCL 6 is optional Additional PDL: UFRII LT (UFRII/UFRII LT Printer Driver for Linux according to a topic about iR2016 in forum Printers from Canon)

Setup (upon guide-ufr2-1.3x.tar.gz obtained from the link above): 

install cndrvcups-common-1.30-1.i386.rpm cndrvcups-ufr2-1.30-1.i386.rpm
restart cups
lpadmin -p ir2018 -m CNCUPSIR2016ZK.ppd -v socket://canon_ip_address:9100 -E
(Debian specific: rpms can be converted to debs by alien, however, the ppd file should be linked in /usr/share/ppd:
ln -s ../cups/model/CNCUPSIR2016ZK.ppd /usr/share/ppd/ )
CNCUPSIR2016ZK means that the ppd for iR2016 works me also for iR2018! http://de.software.canon-europe.com/software/0023676.asp?model= Foomatic entry made by PPDtoXML T/G 0.19 on 2008-09-03
